about.title: Our Story
about.description: Founded in 2019, CLUSTER COFFEE has been dedicated to bringing the finest coffee experiences to our community. We source our beans directly from sustainable farms across the globe, ensuring both quality and ethical practices.
about.craftsmanship: Our master roasters carefully craft each batch to perfection, bringing out the unique characteristics of every bean. We believe in creating not just great coffee, but memorable experiences that bring people together.
